title: Implement Next.js web application for BellaChess native transition
description: Create the Next.js web application with all chess functionality, implement the 6-level AI system using Stockfish WebAssembly, integrate AI coaching features, add etude challenge system, and implement Web3/NFT functionality as per the native transition plan.

title: Implement etude challenge system with puzzle library
description: Create the etude/puzzle system with progressive difficulty, detailed solutions, hint system, and progress tracking as outlined in the product pillars.

title: Create native iOS and Android WebView wrappers for BellaChess
description: Create pure native iOS and Android applications with WebView to wrap the Next.js web application, implementing native features like push notifications, offline caching, and proper app store compliance as per the native transition plan.

title: Implement Web3 NFT integration for digital collectibles
description: Integrate Web3 functionality to enable minting and management of NFT collectibles that represent chess achievements and famous etudes as outlined in the product pillars.

title: Implement AI coach system with adaptive difficulty and game analysis
description: Build the AI coach functionality including skill assessment, personalized learning recommendations, game analysis tools, and adaptive difficulty as outlined in the technical documentation.
